ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, monks have mend too.. and paladins might be able to stun or root, but they have no offensive spells aside from on undead, so if the monk is rooted they
ygData.messageBody:
Well, monks have mend too.. and paladins might be able to stun or root, but
they have no offensive spells aside from on undead, so if the monk is rooted
they can still attack as much as you.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim West <twest@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 3:10 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Fiery Avenger really that good?


>From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>
>
>
>I was talking about fighting MOB's when I said I only miss 1 out of 8
>times. Monks stink because once your HPs are gone, you are toast. You
>forget that Paladins get root also. We also have Stun which will freeze
>your monk to allow us to heal up. All of your quickness does not do you
>any good if you can't move.
>
>Why is this going on this List anyway ? I think we need to start a
>EQbadmouth List for this.
>
>I never play PvP anyway because I think that it is stupid that someone
>could just come up to you and kill you for no other reason. PvP's are none
>other than a bunch of greedy people that want to steal from other people.
>That is why I am glad that the designers of this game were wise enough to
>limit player killing.
>
>
>Tanaman
>
